channel.title: Adding a tele on emote tab?
channel.description: how would i add a "Shops" tab on the emotes?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 23, 2008, 01:51:55 PM[/size][hr]help?

item.title: Adding a tele on emote tab?
item.dc:creator: @Teabag Teabag
item.description:
@Teabag wrote:

well do you want to replace another slot or use a new one

sendFrame126("@whi@Shop",177);

put that in to replace slot 2 i think with a shop word.

but it will tele you to same place unless you change the co-ords, which i am still trying to find myself… :S

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a tele on emote tab?
